name: Roll With It (BassWasTaken, zyzamo, Colin5887, Scratch96, Intuwing)
name_original: Roll With It (BassWasTaken, zyzamo, Colin5887, Scratch96, Intuwing)
description:
This is a game where you don't know what comes next.  Keep up with the pace as 6 side-games change each other. Fail enough times - and you are out, so just Roll With It.

Each of the side-games is unique and they even control differently!

Serve the right food to the right customer , but do it quickly or they will get angry!

The objective is simple - avoid the bullets!

Jump over the obstacles, try not to die (pun intended)

Match the amount of dots on dice with the number on the screen before the timer runs out!

Keep Dicey alive by feeding it at correct intervals. Don't feed it too little - it'll starve, but don't feed it too much, too! Use any key of directional arrows!


Catch a breather. Pet your cat, maybe. Sip some tea. This pause will not last for long, so we hope you'll have a nice break.

Also, hit Escape to exit the game.

Credits:

Colin: Audio Engineer

Scratch: Game Designer/2D Artist

Intuwing: Game Designer/2D Artist

Zyzamo: Game Designer/Programmer

BassWasTaken: Game Designer/Programmer
